name: hometask_2_variables_data_types
description: 1. Create a variable called carName, assign the value Volvo to it. 2. Create a variable called years, assign the value 50 to it. 3. Log the sum of 5 + 10, using two variables: x and y. 4. Create a variable called z, assign x + y to it, and Log the result in console. 5. On one single line, declare three variables with the following names and values: firstName = "John", lastName = "Doe", age = 35 6. Create 2 variables, assign to them values 10 and 5, log to console the value of their multiplication.
